description:
The OpenStack v1.1 API should return 'computeFault' and not 'cloudServersFault'.

http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/1.1/content/Synchronous_Faults-d1e1729.html

---

We should probably still return 'cloudServersFault' for the v1.0 OpenStack API.
title: OpenStack v1.1 API: cloudServersFault should be computeFault

comments.content:

http://docs.openstack.org/api/openstack-compute/1.1/content/Synchronous_Faults-d1e1729.html

We should probably still return 'cloudServersFault' for the v1.0 OpenStack API.
